participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and compassionate, with a tendency to be introspective.
participant_1.background: I enjoy water skiing but feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself. I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals. I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner. I like to make short films. I have a mobile that plays music in my daughter's nursery.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Curious and nostalgic, with a love for storytelling and nature.
participant_2.background: I loved riding horses with my father when I was a child. I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend. I want to learn more about the science behind how gummy worms are made. I was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years. I still call my ex-boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special.

content.text: Hello, I am a single mom and I love to make short films.  How about you?
Hi, I used to ride horses with my father when I was a kid, and I still love them.  What are your interests?
I like water skiing, but I feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself.
That sounds fun!  I like to read my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekends.  I also want to learn more about the science behind how gummy worms are made.
That is so cool!  I have a mobile that plays music in my daughter's nursery.  Are you single or have you been married?
I was a Navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.  I still call my ex-boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special.
Wow, that is a lot of moving around!  I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.  Do you have any pets?
I used to have a cat named Mittens, but he ran away.  I would love to get a dog someday.
I have a dog named Buddy.  He is a golden retriever and he is my best friend.
That sounds adorable!  I would love to see a picture of him.
Sure, here is a picture of him when he was a puppy.
Aww, he is so cute!  I love his big eyes.
Thanks!  He is a handful, but he is a great dog.
I am sure he is!  I really miss having a pet.
I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the picture of Buddy.  I love talking about him.
Me too!  I would love to see him in person sometime.
That would be great!  I am sure we could work something out.
Sounds like a plan!  I look forward to it.
